name: Soul Savior (Der_Kekser, Carryzilla)
description:
Controls:

  • [A/D] Move left and right
  • [S] Drop through platform
  • [J] Jump (short press - low jump, long press - high jump)
  • [K] Attack
  • [L] Dash (sideways and up)
  • [J] Confirm

Story:

She died knowing that she had failed to protect those who she cared about the most.

The terrible feeling of not having fulfilled her destiny kept her in this world.

Unable to forget, she found a new destiny.

Go protect those who seek for a new start after their end.

This game was developed within a week for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1 with the theme "An end is a new beginning".

Graphic design: https://carryzilla.itch.io/
Programming: https://der-kekser.itch.io/
